title: Error in store: Purchasing Lux with 50% off BE
body:
I am able to purchase several other champions for 50% off blue essence but when I try to purchase the Lux champion, I get a prompt message saying: 
"An error has occurred .
Unable to Purchase Item: Unknown Error"

Can this be fixed before the sale is over? Or are there any suggestions?

replies.body: Been seeing a few reports on this.  Is this still an issue?

I am having the same issue. I was able to purchase Morgana but not Lux. Rito Please fix your game 
{{sticker:cass-cry}}
